summary: This module defines automated tests for the ControlNet XSPipeline, covering quick sanity checks of core functionality and extensive integration scenarios. The tests verify component wiring, input processing, batch consistency, support for multiple VAE back‑ends, device and datatype migrations, optimized attention paths, and compilation of the Stable Diffusion backbone, as well as conditioning with edge and depth maps.
business_intent: Guarantee the robustness and correctness of the ControlNet XSPipeline across diverse configurations so that developers and end‑users can rely on stable, high‑quality image generation in production and research environments.
